entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
